Hi All,
I created a profile using the tool Forge(by Furore) with the Constraints added in the "Expression" field, but NOT adding anything in the "XPath expression" field.
see the image attached. pasted image

I was expecting that the IG Publisher will convert the FHIRpath Expression into the corresponding Schematron, but didn't!

So my queries are:
1) Is there any parameter I need to pass so that the IG Publisher generates the corresponding schematrons or the IG Publisher does not do this yet!
2) If the answer to the above is that the IG Publisher has the capability then does the "Key" becomes the part of the error message in the generated schematrons!

Thanks.
I'm not planning to generate XPath from fhirPath any time soon, unless someone wants to put $$ on the table to accelerate that
Also, there are some capabilities that FHIRPath has that can't be supported by Schematron (e.g. some of the value-set and profile stuff)
